`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"JavaScript","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`var lsc = (function (self) {
    var prefix = 'one_more_lsc_'
    /**
     * \u589E\u52A0\u4E00\u4E2A\u952E\u503C\u5BF9\u6570\u636E
     * @param key \u952E
     * @param val \u503C
     * @param expires \u8FC7\u671F\u65F6\u95F4\uFF0C\u5355\u4F4D\u4E3A\u79D2
     */
    self.set = function (key, val, expires) {
        key = prefix + key;
        val = JSON.stringify({'val': val, 'expires': new Date().getTime() + expires * 1000});
        localStorage.setItem(key, val);
    };
    /**
     * \u8BFB\u53D6\u5BF9\u5E94\u952E\u7684\u503C\u6570\u636E
     * @param key \u952E
     * @returns {null|*} \u5BF9\u5E94\u952E\u7684\u503C
     */
    self.get = function (key) {
        key = prefix + key;
        var val = localStorage.getItem(key);
        if (!val) {
            return null;
        }
        val = JSON.parse(val);
        if (val.expires < new Date().getTime()) {
            localStorage.removeItem(key);
            return null;
        }
        return val.val;
    };
    return self;
}(lsc || {}));

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.div,{className:"remark-code-container",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.figure,{"data-rehype-pretty-code-figure":"",children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{style:{backgroundColor:"#24292e",color:"#e1e4e8"},tabIndex:"0","data-language":"JavaScript","data-theme":"github-dark",raw:`var lsc = (function (self) {
    var prefix = 'one_more_lsc_'
    var list = [];
    //\u521D\u59CB\u5316list
    self.init = function () {
        var keys = Object.keys(localStorage);
        var reg = new RegExp('^' + prefix);
        var temp = [];
        //\u904D\u5386\u6240\u6709localStorage\u4E2D\u7684\u6240\u6709key
        for (var i = 0; i < keys.length; i++) {
            //\u627E\u51FA\u53EF\u8FC7\u671F\u7F13\u5B58\u7684key
            if (reg.test(keys[i])) {
                temp.push(keys[i]);
            }
        }
        list = temp;
    };
    self.init();
    self.check = function () {
        if (!list || list.length == 0) {
            return;
        }
        var checkCount = 0;
        while (checkCount < 500) {
            var expireCount = 0;
            //\u968F\u673A\u6D4B\u8BD520\u4E2A\u8BBE\u7F6E\u4E86\u8FC7\u671F\u65F6\u95F4\u7684key
            for (var i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
                if (list.length == 0) {
                    break;
                }
                var index = Math.floor(Math.random() * list.length);
                var key = list[index];
                var val = localStorage.getItem(list[index]);
                //\u4ECElist\u4E2D\u5220\u9664\u88AB\u60F0\u6027\u5220\u9664\u7684key
                if (!val) {
                    list.splice(index, 1);
                    expireCount++;
                    continue;
                }
                val = JSON.parse(val);
                //\u5220\u9664\u6240\u6709\u53D1\u73B0\u7684\u5DF2\u8FC7\u671F\u7684key
                if (val.expires < new Date().getTime()) {
                    list.splice(index, 1);
                    localStorage.removeItem(key);
                    expireCount++;
                }
            }
            //\u82E5\u5220\u9664\u7684key\u4E0D\u8D85\u8FC75\u4E2A\u5219\u8DF3\u51FA\u5FAA\u73AF
            if (expireCount <= 5 || list.length == 0) {
                break;
            }
            checkCount++;
        }
    }
    //\u6BCF\u9694\u4E00\u79D2\u6267\u884C\u4E00\u6B21\u5B9A\u65F6\u5220\u9664
    window.setInterval(self.check, 1000);
    return self;
}(lsc || {}));
